drain(address).details: Will revert:      - If not called by contract ownerEmits:      - Drained(address indexed to, uint amount)

params.to: The address to drain the contract balance to

mintInsiderNft(address).details: Note:      - An insider dNFT does not require buring ETH to mintWill revert:      - If not called by contract owner      - If the maximum number of insider mints has been reached      - If `to` is the zero addressEmits:      - MintNft(address indexed to, uint indexed id)

params.to: The address to mint the dNFT to

returns.id: Id of the new dNFT  Throws a {InsiderMintsExceeded} error if the maximum number of insider mints has been reached.

mintNft(address).details: Mints an dNFT and transfers it to the given `to` address.  Requirements: - msg.value exceeds the minting price Emits a {MintedNft} event on successful execution.

params.to: The address to which the minted NFT will be transferred.

returns.id: The ID of the minted NFT. Throws a {InsufficientFunds} error if the sender does not provide enough ETH to mint the NFT.
